text: Sherry is a fortified wine made from grapes. It is produced in Jerez de la Frontera, Spain. In Spanish, it is called vino de Jerez. == Kinds of Sherry == There are many different kinds of Sherry: * Fino * Oloroso * Amontillado * Cream * Pedro Ximenez Category:Wine Category:Jerez de la Frontera
title: Sherry
